application.summary: GNOME version of a tetris game playable on the net

description.p: GTetrinet is a client program for the popular Tetrinet game, a multiplayer tetris game that is played over the internet. (If you don't know what Tetrinet is, check out tetrinet.org).
Here are links to a couple of Tetrinet servers for Unix/Linux:

ul.li: Tetrinet for Linux - includes both a server and a console client
TetrinetX - a highly configurable server with many features

description.p:
For more information on the gameplay, refer to the tetrinet.txt file that came with the original Tetrinet distribution.
Features:

ul.li: Fully network compatible with Tetrinet v1.13 for Win95/98/NT
Spectator support on Tetrinet-X servers with the qirc patch by Drslum
